events.text: Hey, about the whole world splitting thing..

Yes thankfully. The world gem shattered, but it can be put back together. Each fragment is on a cluster of floating islands. All you need to do is collect them all and put the intact gem back into its pedestal at the temple you found it in.
Sounds simple enough! How do I get there?
The gems attract one another, once you pick one up, it’ll bring you close to the next. Follow the chain and you’ll get to the temple eventually.
There’s one up ahead. Let's get going.
